mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_NO, BODYSHOP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAR_NO, KEY, KEY_EXPIRE_TIME, RESERVATION_TIME, REPAIRED_TIME, REPAIRED_PERSON) VALUES (#{RESERVATION_ID}, #{BODYSHOP_NO}, #{MEMBER_NO}, #{CAR_NO}, #{KEY}, #{KEY_EXPIRE_TIME}, #{RESERVATION_TIME}, #{REPAIRED_TIME}, #{REPAIRED_PERSON})
mapper.select: SELECT key,key_expire_time,member_mname,car_type,car_id,reservation_time,repaired_time,repaired_person FROM member join reservation on member.member_no = reservation.member_no JOIN car ON member.member_no = car.car_no WHERE bodyshop_no = #{bodyshop_no}
SELECT * FROM RESERVATION ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC

SELECT reservation.reservation_time, member.member_mname, reservation.key, reservation.repaired_person, reservation.repaired_time FROM RESERVATION JOIN MEMBER ON RESERVATION.member_no = MEMBER.member_no WHERE MEMBER.member_no = reservation.member_no;
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET KEY=#{KEY} where RESERVATION_NO =#{RESERVATION_NO}
